DataElement.preferredName: Health Utilities Index During Past Week Ability to be Understood When Speaking with People Who Know the Subject Well Status
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Response about a subject's ability, during the past week, to be understood when speaking with people who know the subject well.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Health Utilities Index During Past Week Ability to be Understood When Speaking with People Who Know the Subject Well
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A family of generic health profiles and preference-based systems for measuring health status, reporting health-related quality of life, and producing utility scores._At some point in a given period of time._The most recent week. May include the present day._A question about an individual's ability to be understood when speaking with people who know them well.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A family of generic health profiles and preference-based systems for measuring health status, reporting health-related quality of life, and producing utility scores.

Concepts.definition: A family of generic health profiles and preference-based systems for measuring health status, reporting health-related quality of life, and producing utility scores.

Property.preferredName: During Past Week Ability to be Understood When Speaking with People Who Know the Subject Well

Concepts.definition: At some point in a given period of time.
The most recent week. May include the present day.

Concepts.longName: Ability to be Understood When Speaking with People Who Know the Subject Well
Concepts.definition: A question about an individual's ability to be understood when speaking with people who know them well.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Status of an individual's ability to be understood.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is or was unable to speak at all.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is or was unable to speak at all.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is or was unable to be understood.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is or was unable to be understood.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is or was able to be understood partially.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is or was able to be understood partially.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that an individual is or was able to be understood completely.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that an individual is or was able to be understood completely.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A condition or state at a particular time.

Concepts.definition: A condition or state at a particular time.

ValueDomain.origin: HUI:Health Utilities Index; Feeny et al., Health Utilities Index Chapter 26 In Bert Spilker, ed. Quality of Life and Pharmacoeconomics in Clinical Trials. Second Edition. Philadelphia: Lippincott-Raven Press, 1996, pp 239-252.

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF TEXT 1
ReferenceDocuments.description: Which one of the following best describes your ability, during the past week, to be understood when speaking with people who know you well?
